channel.title: What's so hard bout coding a 474?
channel.description:
Wouldn't it just be a little more advanced than 317?
I need your opinions.

item.title: What's so hard bout coding a 474?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

You can, if you know Java, make the 474 client read the 317 Mapdata instead, that way you’ll have places with emotes and items, just you wont have all the places you would if you was to get all the 474 mapdata.

Read full topic
item.source: What's so hard bout coding a 474?

item.title: What's so hard bout coding a 474?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If you think a server designed for a different rs build is harder to code than another one you are an absolute retard!

Unless your using a C++/C# source it doesnt make a difference. Ultimatly its Java and if some methods or classes are not implimented into a server add it yourself. If you are unable to do this then you shouldnt be making servers in the first place.

Only problem with #474 is the lack of Mapdata, but with patience it should be no problem.

Read full topic
item.source: What's so hard bout coding a 474?

item.title: What's so hard bout coding a 474?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote="`ExiledScape, post:4, topic:275284"][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=363659.msg2761770#msg2761770 date=1240585960]

DONT go down the 400 road! the WORST severs EVER to code!

basically impossible!

Not if you have the knowledge.

@`ExiledScape: Probably just different variables, etc. Just need to get used to it.
[/quote]

Yeah, true.

I’m downloading “Rune474” atm.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2009, 09:20:31 am[/size][hr]Holy shit, I don’t even know how to make myself staff[/quote]

EXACTLY DONT GO DOWN THE ROAD!!!
